title: Reborn as an Omega - Novel Updates
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Naive Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Omegaverse   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Second Chance   Straight Uke   Tsundere
author: 十里寒塘
description:
Ji Jingcheng was born again.

He returned to when he was sixteen years old, and he was still the little master who was pampered by his family.

The home is not broken, his father is not in jail, and his mother is not dead.

Since God has given him a chance to be reborn, he must reverse the future and stop being stepped on by others like mud.

Wait…

“Doctor, what do you mean to differentiate into an Omega?”>
